items.title: The Great Deformation
items.description: America's macroeconomic policy raised up this spectacular suburban edifice and then promptly whacked it in the face with a folding chair. David A. Stockman brings us the story in one battleship of a book. Polemical? Yes. Righteous? Yes. Objective,well, not really, but the authorâ€™s take on the whole concussed,black-eyed, nosebleeding mess that is America makes this an alarming, unputdownable blockbuster.
